title: Hibiscus - Kadamba
description: Hotel restaurant at Savista Retreat, a hospitality destination tucked away in the rural environs of Jaipur city. The food philosophy is farm to fork: the vegetables and grains are grown organically on the Savista farm, and meals are freshly cooked for the number of persons eating. North and south Indian vegetarian food. Bookings must be made by 11am for  the day's evening meal. Directions: from Jaipur take first right turning before Toll Plaza.
